section.title: FileSortingWiz.Wizard Class Reference

para.para: Represents a wizard that processes rule files and manages file data collection.

listitem.para: void CollectFileData (string ruleFileName, string inputDirectory, string outputDirectory, bool silent)

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Represents a wizard that processes rule files and manages file data collection.

The Wizard class provides functionality to initialize components and collect file data based on a specified rule file and directory paths. It is designed to handle operations related to rule file deserialization and logging.
